Treatment of small intestine adenocarcinoma that cannot be removed by surgery may include the following:         - Surgery to bypass the tumor.    -  Radiation therapy as palliative therapy to relieve symptoms and improve the patient's quality of life.    - A clinical trial of radiation therapy with radiosensitizers, with or without chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of new anticancer drugs.    - A clinical trial of biologic t
